text: We were searching for a place to celebrate our daughter’s birthday, and this was our first visit to NSRCC. We were pleasantly surprised by the excellent facilities! There are plenty of activities to enjoy, and the staff were incredibly kind and accommodating. It’s a highly recommended place for family gatherings or special occasions. We had a wonderful time and would definitely come back!

1st visit.. Many golfers or guys gathered here for golfing, some just came for dining.
Fish n chips average, prawn noodle ok..the apple carrot &  juice not bad, the celery apple ok
.

Resort Bowl @ NSRCC.

A good place to bowl on weekdays. I've been here on a few occassions to bowl & have always been greeted well by the friendly staff at the counter. No crowd at all. Lanes are well maintained & oiled. Ball hooked well right to the back end.

I've frequent the Bowling Shop & bought some bowling stuffs from James. A humble experience retired bowler, driller & owner of the shop. Very happy to have him serve us always.

Sadly the Bowling Cafe is not halal but they do serve hot drinks. Good if they served some halal snacks like pau or sandwiches. The least to serve muslim bowlers & chalet occupiers.

They have karaoke rooms & game arcade too but be prepared to loss some token. Machines are abit run down. Overall in one place, serve its purpose well in a club house.
The place is amazing.. staying in bungalow with my family is a wonderful bonding celebratingbtheir birthdays there.. full of activities! Staff are honest and friendly
Nice resort, there's golf academy, fitness centre, swimming pool, bowling centre, squash court, bistro, restaurant /function hall and etc.
